name: Crypto Dashboard
projectDesc: This Crypto Dashboard conatins information on cryptocurrencies so that a user can track the rates, market prices, changes, graph of currencies.

name: Portfolio Demo
projectDesc: This demo portfolio was made using Vanilla Js, Html & Css only. It contains some good ui and navigation buttons.

name: The Meal Finder
projectDesc: This meal finder project allows user to browse some random meals with their ingredients and cooking instructions as well. Also it provides a list of meal via the serach option when user enters any ingredient that they want to make a meal with. This all data is collected using api calls.

name: Exchange Rate Calculator
projectDesc: This Exchange rate calculator provides the user a service to convert 1 curreny into another currency according to the latest rates provided by the exchange rate api..

name: JS Todo List
projectDesc: This Todo list is made using the concept of localstorage in browser. If a user modifies their todo list, It gets modified in the localstorage as well. So in this way even if a user refresh the web page, their data would not vanish.

name: Drum Kit Set
projectDesc: This Drum kit set app was made during my learning process of event listners and event handling of javascript. Whenever a user click the relevant key or presses an instrument's button they plays an instument's beat.

name: Beat Maker
projectDesc: This is an old project of mine which I had created using classes and methods using js only. This app contains multiple sound trackes of multiple instruments and when a user interacts with the touch pads they get added in the playing list. So for that pad the audio of the instrument is played.

name: Pexel Photo App
projectDesc: This is a web page which fetches some random photos using the pexels api and it uses grid structure to allign those images. User have a fascility to open the image in a single click. Also the user can search for specific type of images if thet want.

name: Dice Game
projectDesc: This Dice game is mdae with the help of Javascript. It generates a random number twice for one user each and displays the result status via a falg of winner of round or draw match. It consits of 6 images of dices which are then displayed as per the random number generated.

name: Edge Ledger
projectDesc: This demo project is made for a financial services website where the service provider can list their services and all the history about them.

name: Infinite Scroll
projectDesc: This web app uses an api call to fetch some random data, but the user is displayed only certain items at once. Then wehn the user scrolls down then a loader animation is shown and more items are displayed to user.

name: Adobe Clone
projectDesc: Adobe clone is the clone of Adobe's website only just the frontend part which includes a background gif video as an animation. Rest all data is static.

name: Hotel Boston
projectDesc: This website is made using HTML & Css only. It have 3 pages for Home, About and Contact us.

name: Basic Form Validation
projectDesc: This is a basic form validation which validates the form using regex and js only.

name: Captcha Generator
projectDesc: This was a practice project which I had created a long time ago to simply generate some random letters and then match them with the user input.

name: Random User Generator
projectDesc: This user generator provides random images, name, email address and phone number of a person to user. This whole data is randomized and being fetched from an third party api using fetch calls.
